thread.title: Netflix Pays $283 Million to Use Relativity Films
thread.title_full: Netflix Pays $283 Million to Use Relativity Films - WSJ

author: Tom Corrigan
title: Netflix Pays $283 Million to Use Relativity Films
text:
Netflix Inc. has paid bankrupt film and television studio Relativity Media LLC $283 million in licensing fees since 2010 to stream its content on demand, new bankruptcy-court filings show.
Of the $283 million paid as of August with regard to its U.S. license, Netflix this year has paid $55 million to Relativity, according to papers filed in Relativityâ€™s chapter 11 case in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Manhattan. Netflix also has a...
